description: Unique identifier for this record; used as the table’s primary key.
System-generated date/time when this record was created or last updated (YYYYMMDDHHMMSSmmm); likely an audit stamp—confirm with SME.
Time of day the incident occurred, in HHMMSS (24-hour) format.
Calendar date of the incident, in YYYYMMDD format.
Short category or summary of the incident/claim or follow-up action.
Free-text details about the incident or claim handling, including statuses, parties, and claim numbers.
Identifier of the involved employee/driver; foreign key to the employee master.
Reference to the source entity/table for the employee foreign key (polymorphic link); confirm with SME.
Identifier of the related incident/case; foreign key to the incident master.
Reference to the source entity/table for the incident foreign key (polymorphic link); confirm with SME.
Identifier from a prior system used during data migration or cross-reference; may be null if originated here.
Name of the source table from a prior system from which this record was migrated.
